author: CNN Newsource
title: Activistas por los derechos de los animales interrumpen evento del papa Francisco en Roma
text:
Activistas por los derechos de los animales interrumpen evento del papa Francisco en Roma
Valeria Ordóñez Ghio
(CNN) — Dos activistas por los derechos de los animales del grupo Personas por el Trato Ético de los Animales (PETA, por sus siglas en inglés) interrumpieron este jueves un servicio de oración presidido por el papa Francisco en Roma, hablando en contra de las corridas de toros antes de ser escoltados fuera de la basílica.
El video del incidente muestra a las dos manifestantes gritando al fondo del pasillo durante el servicio religioso, que es un evento anual de la semana de oración por la unidad de los cristianos en la Basílica de San Pablo Extramuros en Roma.
Antes de ser escoltado rápidamente hacia el exerior, uno de los activistas de PETA levantó una pancarta que decía “Dejen de bendecir las corridas”.
El servicio, al que también asistió el líder espiritual de la comunión anglicana mundial, el arzobispo de Canterbury Justin Welby, continuó después de la interrupción.
The-CNN-Wire

author: R Kaushik
title: SA put India in their pace!
text: The capitulation was abject, the surrender complete. Having come to South Africa entertaining visions of finally securing a Test series win in the only country where it has remained elusive so far, Indias hopes were buried just three days into the series at SuperSport Park on Thursday. Having seen Dean Elgar and Marco Jansen extend South Africas first-innings advantage in the first Test to a commanding 163, India faced the daunting task of batting with application and purpose if they were to make a match of it. Instead, in a lacklustre display totally out of sync with their standing as the No. 1 Test side, India rolled over for just 131 in 34.1 overs in the second innings, well beaten by an innings and 32 runs with more than two days remaining. Also Read:India slump to their biggest defeat on South African soil in Test history SAs Nandre Burger celebrates KL Rahuls wicket yesterday. Pic/Getty Images Kohli wages lone battle Even South Africa must have been pleasantly surprised at the rapidity with which Indias batsmen departed the crease, in unseemly hurry as strokes were played with gay abandon. Virat Kohlis stylish 76 was no more than a consolation, the top-order fired out as much because of their adventurism as the discipline of the South African bowling. As is to be expected, there were a clutch of excellent deliveries, including the one from Kagiso Rabada in the third over that slanted into Rohit Sharma and seamed away on pitching to hit off-stump, but there were also outlandish strokes with no respect for the game situation or the conditions. South Africa put down two catches, including off the first delivery of the Indian second innings when Aiden Markram failed to grab an offering low to his right at first slip off Yashasvi Jaiswal. Yet, India continued to look a gift horse in the mouth, failing to tread the thin line between aggression and indiscretion judiciously. Debutant Burger claims four That only two batsmen, Kohli and Shubman Gill, topped double digits must also be a source of worry. South Africas pace battery did just about enough, but they didnt need to do more, not with India in such generous wicket-surrendering mode after having seen the opposition pile on the runs. Nandre Burger, who had an excellent debut, finished with four wickets while Jansen added to his career-best unbeaten 84 with a three-wicket burst including the scalps with identical full balls of Gill and Shreyas Iyer. Jansen had taken the lead role in the morning when South Africa resumed at 256 for five in reply to Indias 245. The game was still in the balance but there was no joy for Indias bowlers as the sixth-wicket alliance burgeoned to 111. Jasprit Bumrah was tireless and unflagging and R Ashwin asked tricky questions on a seam-friendly surface, but the other pacers again disappointed, too full or too short and mercilessly punished. Elgars seven-and-a-quarter-hour vigil that fetched him 185 was finally ended by Shardul Thakur. India finished well short of that tally in their second dig, comprehensively schooled by the hosts. Brief scoresIndia 245 & 131 all out (V Kohli 76; N Burger 4-33, M Jansen 3-36, K Rabada 2-32) lost to South Africa 408 (D Elgar 185, M Jansen 84*, D Bedingham 56; J Bumrah 4-69, M Siraj 2-91) by an innings and 32 runs

author: Quartz
title: Just 3 of Nvidia's customers made up more than 30% of its revenue last year
text:
Nvidia (NVDA-7.37%) finished the fiscal year by delivering record revenue and outlook above expectations for the fourth quarter — and more than doubling its full-year revenue from the previous year.
The chipmaker reported revenue of $39.3 billion for the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2025 — a 78% increase from the previous year, and above the consensus of $38.1 billion. Meanwhile, Nvidia’s full-year revenue grew 114% year over year to a record $130.5 billion.
“We’ve successfully ramped up the massive-scale production of Blackwell AI supercomputers, achieving billions of dollars in sales in its first quarter,” Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said in a statement, adding that demand for the new chips is “amazing” as companies roll out reasoning AI models.
According to Nvidia’s 10-K filing, just three anonymous customers made up more than 30% of total revenue for the fiscal year ended in January.
“Direct Customer A” accounted for 12% of total revenue, while Direct Customers B and C each represented 11%, according to the Securities and Exchange Commission filing. Direct Customer B made up 13% of total revenue for fiscal year 2024, the filing said.
All of the sales “were primarily attributable to the Compute & Networking segment,” according to the filing.
For the fiscal third quarter, Nvidia had reported revenue of $35.1 billion,94%25%20from%20a%20year%20ago.) — 36% of which came from three unnamed customers. For the three months ended in October, Customers A, B, and C each accounted for 12% of Nvidia’s quarterly revenue, according to the company’s Form 10-Q.
The filing also showed that, in the first nine months of fiscal year 2025, sales to Customers B and C each made up 11% of revenue, while a Customer D accounted for 12% of revenue.
Although the chipmaker will not disclose the companies, its top customers could likely include Alphabet (GOOGL-2.22%), Amazon (AMZN-2.20%), Meta (META-1.98%), Microsoft (MSFT-1.57%), and Tesla (TSLA-2.64%).
The post Just 3 of Nvidia’s customers made up more than 30% of its revenue last year appeared first on Quartz.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance

author: globo.com
title: Sassá discute com torcedor, após empate do Amazonas com lanterna da Série B; Veja o vídeo | amazonas fc | ge
text:
O Amazonas e mpatou em casa contra o Guarani, lanterna da Série B, na noite desta quarta-feira, na noite desta quarta-feira (25), no estádio Carlos Zamith . Em um vídeo publicado nas redes sociais, o atacante Sassá, aparece discutindo com um torcedor na saída do estádio.
Sassá discute com torcedor na saída do estádio
No momento da discursão, é possível ver o volante Jiménez tentando acalmar os ânimos e um rapaz de preto ao lado do atacante. Apontado como o segurança de Sassá, em alguns comentários nas redes sociais, o homem é na verdade um familiar do jogador. Procurado pelo ge, o clube informou que não vai se pronunciar sobre a situação.
Sassá fez o gol de empate do Aurinegro, que perdia por 1 a 0, até o fim do primeiro tempo. O atacante não marcava há seis jogos.
O Amazonas chegou ao terceiro jogo de invencibilidade na Série B, mas segue sem vencer em casa, desde a vitória por 1 a 0 contra o Coritiba, na 12ª rodada . A Onça ocupa a 14ª posição da tabela com 21 pontos, três a frente do primeiro time da zona de rebaixamento.
1 de 1 Sassá marcou contra o Guarani na Série B — Foto: Fernando Vasconcelos Sassá marcou contra o Guarani na Série B — Foto: Fernando Vasconcelos
+Amazonas
O Amazonas enfrenta o Ituano no próximo sábado (03), às 21h30 (de Brasília), no estádio Carlos Zamith, em duelo válido pela 19° rodada da Série B do Brasileiro.

author: Witold Pryjda
title: PayPal ist auf Steam in vielen Ländern weltweit nicht mehr nutzbar
text:
PayPal ist auf Steam in vielen Ländern weltweit nicht mehr nutzbar
Steam-Nutzerin der Schweiz, Polen und vielen anderen Ländern können seit Juli nicht mehr mit
PayPalbezahlen. Valve erklärte nun erstmals offiziell, warum der Zahlungsdienstleister nur noch sechs Währungen unterstützt.
PayPal blockiert Steam-Käufe weltweit
Seit Anfang Juli 2025 berichten zahlreiche Nutzer in den offiziellen Steam-Foren über Probleme bei der Nutzung von PayPal als Zahlungsmethode außerhalb bestimmter Währungen. Betroffene Nutzer in Ländern wie der Schweiz, Polen, Norwegen und Mexiko erhalten die Meldung, dass Steam "vorübergehend keine Transaktionen mit dieser Zahlungsmethode verarbeiten kann".Nun hat sich Valve erstmals öffentlich zu der Angelegenheit geäußert und bestätigt, dass PayPal derzeit nur noch Transaktionen in sechs Währungen auf der Plattform abwickelt (via
Rock Paper Shotgun): Euro, kanadischer Dollar, britisches Pfund, japanischer Yen, australischer Dollar und US-Dollar. Die währungsbasierte Beschränkung schließt sogar einige EU-Nationen aus - Steam-Nutzer in Polen beispielsweise können PayPal nicht länger für Steam-Käufe verwenden, obwohl das Land Teil der EU ist. Grund: Deutschlands östliche Nachbarn verwenden noch den Zloty als offizielle Währung.
Acquiring Bank beendet Zusammenarbeit
Die aktualisierte Steam-Checkout-Seite wurde vonReddit-NutzernAnfang dieser Woche entdeckt, sie teilten Screenshots der Erklärung, warum andere Währungen als die sechs genannten nun von PayPal blockiert werden. Laut Valves teilte PayPal Anfang Juli 2025 mit, dass ihre Acquiring Bank für Zahlungstransaktionen in bestimmten Währungen die Verarbeitung aller Steam-bezogenen Transaktionen sofort beenden würde.
Eine Acquiring Bank fungiert bei der Zahlungsabwicklung als Vermittler zwischen Händlern und Kreditkartenunternehmen. Diese Banken sind für die Autorisierung und Abwicklung von Kartentransaktionen verantwortlich und arbeiten eng mit Anbietern wie PayPal zusammen. Der Rückzug einer solchen Bank kann erhebliche Auswirkungen auf die verfügbaren Zahlungsoptionen haben, da alternative Acquiring-Partner erst gefunden und integriert werden müssen.
Millionen von Nutzern betroffen
PayPal unterstützt nun nur noch sechs Währungen auf Steam, was Millionen von Spielern die Option nimmt, den Zahlungsdienst für Spielkäufe zu verwenden. Besonders schwerwiegend ist der Effekt in Ländern, in denen PayPal noch operativ und weit verbreitet war - allein Brasilien hat fast fünf Millionen Steam-Nutzer, die nun alle PayPal nicht mehr für Käufe verwenden können.Steam hatte in der Vergangenheit bereits mehrfach mit Zahlungsdienstleistern zu kämpfen. PayPal selbst war zeitweise komplett von der Plattform verschwunden, bevor es 2016 wieder eingeführt wurde. Die Gaming-Branche gilt bei Finanzdienstleistern oft als risikoreich, da digitale Güter schwerer rückverfolgbar sind und Chargeback-Raten höher ausfallen können.
Zusammenhang mit Zensur-Kontroverse?
Die PayPal-Ausschlüsse schienen außerhalb der Diskussionen im Steam-Subreddit weitgehend unbemerkt zu bleiben, möglicherweise weil sie sporadisch erschienen und zeitlich mit Steams Kontroverse über Erwachseneninhalte zusammenfielen. Fans vermuten, dass dies mit der laufenden Visa- und Mastercard-Kontroverse zusammenhängen könnte, bei der Zahlungsdienstleister Druck auf Steam bezüglich sexueller und "anstößiger" Inhalte ausüben.Valve war jedoch sehr deutlich in seiner Antwort, als Mastercard versuchte, die Schuld für die Entfernung von NSFW-Spielen auf Steam abzuwälzen. Das relative Schweigen zu diesem PayPal-Problem lässt vermuten, dass die beiden Probleme nicht zusammenhängen. Auch die Tatsache, dass das britische Pfund eine der akzeptierten Währungen bleibt, deutet darauf hin.
Was haltet ihr von diesen Zahlungseinschränkungen? Nutzt ihr alternative Methoden oder Steam-Guthaben-Codes? Teilt eure Erfahrungen in den Kommentaren!
Zusammenfassung
- PayPal verarbeitet auf Steam nur noch Transaktionen in sechs Währungen
- Betroffen sind zahlreiche Länder wie die Schweiz, Polen und Norwegen
- Grund ist der Rückzug einer Acquiring Bank für bestimmte Währungen
- Millionen Spieler können PayPal nicht mehr für Steam-Käufe verwenden
- Die Einschränkung gilt selbst für EU-Mitglieder mit eigener Währung
- Die Gaming-Branche gilt bei Finanzdienstleistern als risikoreicher Sektor
- Der Zusammenhang mit der Kontroverse um Erwachseneninhalte wird verneint

author: Jami Ganz
title: Cause of death confirmed for ’90 Day Fianc\u00e9’ star David Murphey
text:
“90 Day Fiancé” star [David Murphey’s cause of death has been confirmed](https://www.tmz.com/2024/12/19/90-day-fiance-star-david-murphey-cause-of-death/), one day after his family announced his death on social media.
The 66-year-old reality star died as a result of cardiac issues, including [arrhythmia](https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/heart-arrhythmia/symptoms-causes/syc-20350668) and [hypertensive cardiovascular disease](https://my.clevelandclinic.org/health/diseases/21840-hypertensive-heart-disease), a spokesperson for Clark County, Nevada told TMZ.
He also suffered from a history of [pulmonary embolism](https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/pulmonary-embolism/symptoms-causes/syc-20354647), a potentially deadly blockage in the lung, caused by a blood clot.
His family announced in an Instagram post Wednesday that [Murphey died on Dec. 11 at his Las Vegas home](https://www.instagram.com/p/DDum23Iy4UY/) following years of health issues. He’d been [diagnosed last year with liver cancer](https://www.tmz.com/2024/12/18/90-day-fiance-star-david-murphey-dead/) and had since undergone more than 13 surgeries, sources with direct knowledge previously told TMZ.
Though Murphey was supposed to have another surgery, his loved ones told the outlet he was “very frail and unwell” in his final days.
“David was a veteran, small business owner, and software engineer. He had recently retired from the Clark County Treasurer’s office in Nevada, having also worked for H&R Block and IGT,” his family said. “He was also well known for his time as a cast member on [’90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days.'”](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Zb310TyemY)
Murphey [debuted on the fourth season of the TLC spinoff](https://www.imdb.com/name/nm11521746/) in 2020, which documented his longtime online romance with Ukrainian girlfriend Lana. Though the [former couple got engaged at the end of that season](https://www.eonline.com/news/1411320/90-day-fiance-star-david-murphey-dead-at-66), they ultimately broke up but Murphey’s time in the “90 Day” franchise endured for another two years.
He appeared in a dozen episodes of “90 Day Fiancé: B90 Strikes Back!” and a handful of episodes across “90 Day Bares All” and “90 Day Diaries.”
Murphey’s time on TLC “allowed him to connect with viewers, see the world, and share his experiences with his thousands of followers on Instagram,” his family said.
Murphey is survived by his two sisters and his adopted cat, Gamera. His family asked that those who wish to “help” do so by making donations in his name to [The Animal Foundation](https://animalfoundation.com/ways-give/give-honor-or-memory).

author: NewsBreak Original
title: The warmest December in Blue Earth County history
text: The popular image of an idyllic December is one of white Christmases, hot chocolate retreats, snow-capped conifers, and cozy, cold-weather activities. But not every December lives up to those expectations. Most of the continental U.S. will experience its peak winter cold weather in January and February . Officially, winter doesn't even start until Dec. 21. Across the U.S., the average December temperature from 1901-2000 was right above freezing point, at 32.68 F. Yearly temperatures can be compared to this 20th-century long-term average to find how uncommon a year's December climate was. The nation's warmest December on record was 2021, when the average temperature reached 6.66 F above the long-term average, at 39.34 F. December 2022 was closer to the previous century's average for the U.S. overall, at 33.08 F. The average temperature in Blue Earth County, Minnesota from 1901-2000 was 18.2. The diverse climates of the U.S. mean residents can experience a range of holiday weather without breaking out their passports. Within the continental U.S., Monroe County, Florida, at the Southeast tip of the state, reported the highest average December temperature during the past century at 67.6 F. On the other end of the spectrum was Roseau County, Minnesota, bordering Canada, at 7.2 F. However, across both sides of the extremes, temperatures are warming. While that doesn't mean every December will be warmer than the last or the prior century's average, it does mean long-term temperature averages will continue to inch up the thermometer. When did Blue Earth County, Minnesota experience its warmest December? To find out, Stacker used data from the National Centers for Environmental Information to identify the 15 Decembers with the highest average temperature since 1895. Also included is how that year's temperature compared to the 1901-2000 average. Read on to see if you lived through the warmest December in Blue Earth County, Minnesota history.

author: Guanarteme
title: #26 La prensa francesa considera una clara victoria de Rusia que la justicia internacional le diera la razón en la denuncia de Ucrania (inglés)
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#1](c1#c-1) Igual deberías tomarte la molestia de ver el vídeo, aunque sólo sea para constatar el microblogging en la entradilla, como observa [#6](c6#c-6).
Por cierto, ¿qué me dices este otro fallo del Tribunal Internacional de Justicia?
UN international court of justice orders Russia to halt invasion of Ukraine
[#8](c8#c-8) Contrastar es de putinejo: Rusia mala, Ucrania buena, Ucrania va ganando y tenemos que hacer que vaya ganando más todavía para que Rusia, que tiene armamento de tiempos de los zares y tropas de la edad de bronce, no llegue hasta Lisboa.
A ver, que realmente no sé si Rusia es tan putapénica por qué es una amenaza, pero que tampoco quiero ser putinejo poniéndome a pensar.
[#9](c9#c-9) No dices nada sobre el microblogging de este envío, o sobre este otro fallo del Tribunal Internacional de Justicia.
UN international court of justice orders Russia to halt invasion of Ukraine (16-03-2022)
Imagino que también lo verás como un revés tremendo para Rusia. O quizá es que no has tenido tiempo de revisarlo, porque estás demasiado ocupado "pensando".
[#10](c10#c-10) Sí, sí, sí.... ¡Microbloging putinejo! He dicho que es todo putinejo menos la patrulla otanina.
¿Revés para Rusia? Todo, desde el minuto uno revés tras revés, con nuestras gloriosas sanciones ya están en la Edad Media, a Putin está a punto de cargárselo el estallido social para poner a un borrachillo entrañable como Yeltsin y vivan los corgies ¡Carajo!
[#11](c11#c-11) O sea, que no tienes nada que decir sobre el microblogging de este envío, o sobre el hecho de que el TIJ ordenó a Rusia que cese su invasión a Ucrania. Hace casi dos años.
Curioso, si para tí que Rusia gane un caso frente a Ucrania es una derrota tremenda para esta última.
Estoy empezando a pensar que todas tus repeticiones de la palabra "putinejo" podrían ser un caso de "Excusatio non petita, accusatio manifesta".
O quizá es un fallo muy localizado de tu capacidad de "contraste".
[#13](c13#c-13) Joer, Supi ¿Qué parte de "si a todo" no entendiste? Oye ¿Por qué estás tan encima de mí estos últimos días, qué quieres, una canción?, ¡Pues toma una canción, hombre ya! Pero de las viejas ¿Eh?
Tema: Supilú
Música: Coconut
[#16](c16#c-16) Yo también tengo una canción para ti. Y, para que no creas que te quiero mal, he decidido poner una que, sin duda, te encantará:
[#20](c20#c-20) ¿Te das cuenta de que tienes que inventarte lo que pienso para tener algo de que hablarme?
Es una pregunta retórica ¡Venga, hasta la próxima!
